statements: SELECT * FROM email_marketing_lists WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT email, first_name, last_name FROM email_marketing_lists WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM email_marketing_lists WHERE gender = 'M' AND location = 'New York';
SELECT customer_id, age, interests FROM email_marketing_lists WHERE behavior LIKE '%loyal%';
SELECT first_name, location FROM email_marketing_lists WHERE interests LIKE '%sports%' AND interests LIKE '%fashion%';
SELECT * FROM email_marketing_lists WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40;
SELECT email, last_name, behavior FROM email_marketing_lists WHERE location = 'London' OR location = 'Paris';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, interests FROM email_marketing_lists WHERE behavior = 'active' AND interests IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM email_marketing_lists WHERE gender IN ('M', 'F') AND age < 25;
SELECT first_name, location FROM email_marketing_lists WHERE behavior = 'engaged' AND interests NOT LIKE '%technology%';
SELECT * FROM email_marketing_lists WHERE age > 50 AND location != 'San Francisco';
SELECT customer_id, email, age FROM email_marketing_lists WHERE interests LIKE '%food%' OR interests LIKE '%travel%';
SELECT * FROM email_marketing_lists WHERE gender = 'F' AND location = 'Los Angeles' AND interests IS NOT NULL;
SELECT first_name, last_name, location FROM email_marketing_lists WHERE behavior = 'interested' AND age > 35;
SELECT * FROM email_marketing_lists WHERE behavior LIKE '%potential%' AND interests LIKE '%shopping%';
SELECT customer_id, email, gender FROM email_marketing_lists WHERE age >= 18;
SELECT email, first_name, last_name FROM email_marketing_lists WHERE age < 30 AND interests LIKE '%music%';
SELECT * FROM email_marketing_lists WHERE age > 45 AND behavior = 'loyal' AND interests NOT LIKE '%sports%';
SELECT customer_id, age, gender FROM email_marketing_lists WHERE location = 'Chicago' AND interests IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM email_marketing_lists WHERE interests = 'reading' OR interests = 'cooking';
SELECT * FROM email_marketing_lists WHERE age >= 18 AND gender = 'M' AND location LIKE '%New York%';
SELECT customer_id, email, age FROM email_marketing_lists WHERE gender = 'F' AND interests LIKE '%sports%';
SELECT DISTINCT first_name, last_name FROM email_marketing_lists WHERE behavior = 'active' ORDER BY last_name, first_name;

SELECT email, first_name, last_name, location FROM email_marketing_lists WHERE behavior IN ('inactive', 'dormant') AND (interests LIKE '%music%' OR interests LIKE '%movies%') ORDER BY location, last_name;
SELECT AVG(age) AS average_age, COUNT(customer_id) AS total_customers FROM email_marketing_lists WHERE gender = 'M';
SELECT location, COUNT(customer_id) AS total_customers FROM email_marketing_lists GROUP BY location ORDER BY total_customers DESC;
SELECT gender, COUNT(DISTINCT location) AS unique_locations FROM email_marketing_lists GROUP BY gender;
SELECT behavior, AVG(age) AS average_age FROM email_marketing_lists GROUP BY behavior;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM email_marketing_lists WHERE age >= 25 AND age <= 40 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT customer_id, email, interests FROM email_marketing_lists WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%' AND interests IS NOT NULL;
SELECT first_name, last_name, interests FROM email_marketing_lists WHERE interests LIKE '%technology%' AND age >= 30 ORDER BY last_name, first_name;
SELECT * FROM email_marketing_lists WHERE customer_id BETWEEN 1001 AND 2000 AND behavior = 'active' AND gender = 'F';
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM email_marketing_lists WHERE location IN ('New York', 'Los Angeles', 'Chicago') ORDER BY location;
SELECT first_name, last_name, behavior FROM email_marketing_lists WHERE behavior <> 'active' ORDER BY last_name, first_name;
SELECT customer_id, email, interests FROM email_marketing_lists WHERE interests LIKE '%travel%' OR interests LIKE '%food%' ORDER BY interests;
SELECT customer_id, email, age, interests FROM email_marketing_lists WHERE age >= 20 AND interests IS NOT NULL ORDER BY age DESC, interests;
SELECT * FROM email_marketing_lists WHERE gender = 'M' AND (location LIKE '%California%' OR (interests LIKE '%sports%' AND age >= 25));
SELECT first_name, last_name, behavior FROM email_marketing_lists WHERE age < 30 AND (behavior = 'inactive' OR behavior = 'dormant') ORDER BY behavior, first_name, last_name;
SELECT customer_id, email, location FROM email_marketing_lists WHERE gender = 'F' AND age BETWEEN 18 AND 30 AND location NOT LIKE '%Texas%' ORDER BY age, location;
SELECT customer_id, email, behavior FROM email_marketing_lists WHERE (behavior = 'inactive' OR behavior = 'dormant') AND interests IS NOT NULL ORDER BY behavior, customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customer_demographics;
SELECT name, age FROM customer_demographics;
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customer_demographics WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM customer_behavior;
SELECT purchase_history FROM customer_behavior WHERE subscription_status = TRUE;
SELECT customer_id, visit_count FROM customer_behavior WHERE visit_count > 10;
SELECT * FROM customer_demographics WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT name, gender, location FROM customer_demographics WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT customer_id, last_login FROM customer_behavior WHERE subscription_status = FALSE;
SELECT name, age, location FROM customer_demographics WHERE age < 25;
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customer_demographics WHERE location = 'California';
SELECT * FROM customer_behavior WHERE visit_count < 5;
SELECT customer_id, name, age, gender FROM customer_demographics WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40;
SELECT customer_id, subscription_status FROM customer_behavior WHERE last_login > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customer_demographics WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT customer_id, visit_count FROM customer_behavior WHERE subscription_status = TRUE;
SELECT name, age FROM customer_demographics WHERE location = 'Texas';
SELECT customer_id, purchase_history FROM customer_behavior WHERE visit_count > 20;
SELECT * FROM customer_demographics WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT name, email FROM customer_demographics WHERE age >= 18;
SELECT * FROM customer_demographics WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Male';
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customer_demographics WHERE location LIKE '%New York%';
SELECT * FROM customer_behavior WHERE subscription_status = TRUE ORDER BY last_login DESC;
SELECT name, email, age FROM customer_demographics JOIN customer_behavior ON customer_demographics.customer_id = customer_behavior.customer_id WHERE subscription_status = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM customer_demographics WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(visit_count) AS total_visits FROM customer_behavior GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_visits > 100;
SELECT customer_id, name, email, location FROM customer_demographics WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM customer_behavior WHERE subscription_status = TRUE);
SELECT MAX(age) AS max_age, MIN(age) AS min_age FROM customer_demographics;
SELECT AVG(visit_count) AS avg_visits FROM customer_behavior;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM customer_demographics;

SELECT customer_id, name FROM customer_demographics UNION SELECT customer_id, purchase_history->>'item' AS item_name FROM customer_behavior JOIN customer_demographics ON customer_behavior.customer_id = customer_demographics.customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, name, email, location FROM customer_demographics WHERE age >= 18 AND gender IN ('Male','Female') ORDER BY age DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(visit_count) AS avg_visits FROM customer_behavior GROUP BY customer_id HAVING avg_visits > 5;
SELECT customer_id, name, email, location, purchase_history FROM customer_demographics JOIN customer_behavior ON customer_demographics.customer_id = customer_behavior.customer_id;
SELECT MAX(visit_count) AS max_visits FROM customer_behavior;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM customer_demographics;

SELECT customer_id, name, email, age, COUNT(purchase_history) AS purchase_count FROM customer_demographics JOIN customer_behavior ON customer_demographics.customer_id = customer_behavior.customer_id GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT DISTINCT gender FROM customer_demographics;
SELECT customer_id, name, email, location FROM customer_demographics WHERE location <> 'Unknown';
SELECT customer_id, name, email, location FROM customer_demographics WHERE name ILIKE '%john%' AND email NOT LIKE '%example.com%';
SELECT * FROM customer_demographics;
SELECT customer_id, email, age FROM customer_demographics WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, gender, location FROM customer_demographics WHERE gender = 'Male' AND age < 50;
SELECT email FROM customer_demographics WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM customer_behaviors;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_history FROM customer_behaviors WHERE subscription_status = 'Active';
SELECT customer_id, last_activity FROM customer_behaviors WHERE last_activity > '2022-01-01';
SELECT email FROM customer_behaviors WHERE purchase_history LIKE '%shoes%';
SELECT * FROM customer_interests;
SELECT customer_id, interests FROM customer_interests WHERE interests LIKE '%cooking%';
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customer_interests WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM customer_demographics cd JOIN customer_behaviors cb ON cd.customer_id = cb.customer_id;
SELECT cd.customer_id, cb.email, cb.subscription_status FROM customer_demographics cd JOIN customer_behaviors cb ON cd.customer_id = cb.customer_id WHERE cb.subscription_status = 'Active';
SELECT cd.customer_id, cb.purchase_history FROM customer_demographics cd JOIN customer_behaviors cb ON cd.customer_id = cb.customer_id WHERE cd.age > 25;
SELECT cd.email, cb.last_activity FROM customer_demographics cd JOIN customer_behaviors cb ON cd.customer_id = cb.customer_id WHERE cb.last_activity > '2022-02-01';
SELECT cd.location, ci.interests FROM customer_demographics cd JOIN customer_interests ci ON cd.customer_id = ci.customer_id WHERE ci.interests LIKE '%travel%';
SELECT * FROM customer_demographics WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM customer_behaviors WHERE subscription_status = 'Cancelled');
SELECT cd.*, ci.interests FROM customer_demographics cd JOIN customer_interests ci ON cd.customer_id = ci.customer_id;
SELECT cb.customer_id, cb.email, ci.interests FROM customer_behaviors cb JOIN customer_interests ci ON cb.customer_id = ci.customer_id;
SELECT AVG(cb.purchase_history) AS average_purchase_duration FROM customer_behaviors cb;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_customers FROM customer_demographics;
SELECT * FROM customer_demographics WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, email, age FROM customer_demographics WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT customer_id, email, gender FROM customer_demographics WHERE location LIKE '%New York%;
SELECT COUNT(customer_id) AS total_customers FROM customer_demographics;
SELECT customer_id, email, purchase_history FROM customer_behaviors WHERE subscription_status = 'Active';
SELECT customer_id, email, interests FROM customer_interests WHERE interests LIKE '%Technology%';
SELECT customer_id, email, age, gender FROM customer_demographics ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT customer_id, email, last_activity FROM customer_behaviors WHERE last_activity BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT customer_id, email, location FROM customer_demographics WHERE location IN ('California', 'Texas');
SELECT customer_id, email, age, subscription_status FROM customer_demographics INNER JOIN customer_behaviors ON customer_demographics.customer_id = customer_behaviors.customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, email, interests FROM customer_interests WHERE interests = 'Sports' AND customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM customer_demographics WHERE age > 25);
SELECT customer_id, email, purchase_history FROM customer_behaviors WHERE purchase_history IS NOT NULL;
SELECT AVG(age) AS average_age FROM customer_demographics;
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customer_demographics WHERE gender = 'Male' UNION SELECT customer_id, email FROM customer_demographics WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT location) AS unique_locations FROM customer_demographics;
SELECT customer_id, email, purchase_history FROM customer_behaviors WHERE subscription_status = 'Canceled' AND last_activity < NOW();
SELECT customer_id, email, gender FROM customer_demographics WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT customer_id, email, interests FROM customer_interests WHERE interests IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_id, email, age, gender FROM customer_demographics WHERE location = 'Chicago';
SELECT MAX(age) AS max_age FROM customer_demographics;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT email_address, first_name, last_name FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, age, gender FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM demographics;
SELECT customer_id, income, education_level FROM demographics;
SELECT * FROM behaviors;
SELECT customer_id, subscription_status FROM behaviors;
SELECT * FROM interests;
SELECT customer_id, interest1, interest2 FROM interests;
SELECT customer_id, email_address, subscription_status FROM customers JOIN behaviors ON customers.customer_id = behaviors.customer_id;
SELECT c.customer_id, c.first_name, d.income FROM customers c JOIN demographics d ON c.customer_id = d.customer_id;
SELECT c.customer_id, c.location, b.purchase_history FROM customers c JOIN behaviors b ON c.customer_id = b.customer_id;
SELECT c.customer_id, i.interest1, i.interest2 FROM customers c JOIN interests i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id;
SELECT c.customer_id, c.first_name, b.subscription_status, i.interest1 FROM customers c JOIN behaviors b ON c.customer_id = b.customer_id JOIN interests i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id;
SELECT c.customer_id, c.age, d.education_level, b.subscription_status FROM customers c JOIN demographics d ON c.customer_id = d.customer_id JOIN behaviors b ON c.customer_id = b.customer_id;
SELECT c.customer_id, c.email_address, d.income, i.interest1 FROM customers c JOIN demographics d ON c.customer_id = d.customer_id JOIN interests i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id;
SELECT c.customer_id, c.first_name, d.occupation, b.subscription_status FROM customers c JOIN demographics d ON c.customer_id = d.customer_id JOIN behaviors b ON c.customer_id = b.customer_id;
SELECT c.customer_id, c.gender, d.marital_status, i.interest1 FROM customers c JOIN demographics d ON c.customer_id = d.customer_id JOIN interests i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id;
SELECT c.customer_id, c.age, b.subscription_status, i.interest1 FROM customers c JOIN behaviors b ON c.customer_id = b.customer_id JOIN interests i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id;
SELECT c.customer_id, c.location, d.income, i.interest1 FROM customers c JOIN demographics d ON c.customer_id = d.customer_id JOIN interests i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, age FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, email_address, location FROM customers WHERE gender='Male' AND age BETWEEN 25 AND 40;
SELECT c.customer_id, c.first_name, c.last_name, d.income FROM customers c JOIN demographics d ON c.customer_id = d.customer_id;
SELECT c.customer_id, c.first_name, c.last_name, b.subscription_status FROM customers c JOIN behaviors b ON c.customer_id = b.customer_id WHERE b.subscription_status = 'Active';
SELECT customer_id, purchase_history FROM behaviors WHERE purchase_history IS NOT NULL;
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, i.interest1, i.interest2, i.interest3 FROM customers c LEFT JOIN interests i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id;
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, d.education_level, d.occupation FROM customers c JOIN demographics d ON c.customer_id = d.customer_id WHERE d.education_level = 'Bachelor's Degree';

SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, b.subscription_status, i.interest1 FROM customers c JOIN behaviors b ON c.customer_id = b.customer_id LEFT JOIN interests i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id WHERE b.subscription_status = 'Active';

SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, d.income, d.education_level, i.interest1 FROM customers c JOIN demographics d ON c.customer_id = d.customer_id LEFT JOIN interests i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id WHERE d.income > 50000;

SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, d.marital_status, b.purchase_history FROM customers c JOIN demographics d ON c.customer_id = d.customer_id JOIN behaviors b ON c.customer_id = b.customer_id WHERE d.marital_status = 'Married' OR b.purchase_history LIKE '%electronics%';

SELECT c.customer_id, c.first_name, c.last_name, d.income, d.occupation, i.interest1, i.interest2 FROM customers c JOIN demographics d ON c.customer_id = d.customer_id LEFT JOIN interests i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id WHERE d.occupation = 'Engineer';

SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, d.education_level, b.subscription_status, i.interest3 FROM customers c JOIN demographics d ON c.customer_id = d.customer_id JOIN behaviors b ON c.customer_id = b.customer_id LEFT JOIN interests i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id WHERE d.education_level = 'Master's Degree' AND b.subscription_status = 'Inactive';

SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, d.occupation, b.subscription_status, i.interest1 FROM customers c JOIN demographics d ON c.customer_id = d.customer_id LEFT JOIN behaviors b ON c.customer_id = b.customer_id LEFT JOIN interests i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id WHERE d.occupation = 'Teacher';

SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, d.marital_status, b.subscription_status, i.interest2 FROM customers c JOIN demographics d ON c.customer_id = d.customer_id JOIN behaviors b ON c.customer_id = b.customer_id LEFT JOIN interests i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id WHERE d.marital_status = 'Single' AND b.subscription_status = 'Inactive';

SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, d.income, b.subscription_status, i.interest1 FROM customers c JOIN demographics d ON c.customer_id = d.customer_id LEFT JOIN behaviors b ON c.customer_id = b.customer_id JOIN interests i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id WHERE d.income BETWEEN 50000 AND 80000;

SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, d.marital_status, b.purchase_history, i.interest3 FROM customers c JOIN demographics d ON c.customer_id = d.customer_id JOIN behaviors b ON c.customer_id = b.customer_id LEFT JOIN interests i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id WHERE d.marital_status = 'Divorced' AND b.purchase_history LIKE '%clothing%';

SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, d.income, d.education_level, b.subscription_status, i.interest2 FROM customers c JOIN demographics d ON c.customer_id = d.customer_id JOIN behaviors b ON c.customer_id = b.customer_id JOIN interests i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id WHERE d.education_level = 'High School Diploma' AND d.income < 40000 AND b.subscription_status = 'Active';

SELECT c.customer_id, c.first_name, c.last_name, d.marital_status, d.occupation, b.subscription_status, i.interest1 FROM customers c JOIN demographics d ON c.customer_id = d.customer_id LEFT JOIN behaviors b ON c.customer_id = b.customer_id LEFT JOIN interests i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id WHERE d.marital_status = 'Widowed';

SELECT purchase_history FROM customer_behaviors
SELECT customer_id, engagement_score FROM customer_behaviors

SELECT list_name, list_description FROM email_lists
SELECT * FROM segmentation_rules
SELECT rule_name, rule_condition FROM segmentation_rules
SELECT rule_id, rule_name, rule_condition FROM segmentation_rules
SELECT rule_name FROM segmentation_rules WHERE rule_id = 1
SELECT list_name FROM email_lists WHERE list_id = 3
SELECT customer_id, age FROM customer_demographics WHERE gender = 'Male'
SELECT customer_id, interest_category FROM customer_interests WHERE interest_level > 5
SELECT age, gender, location FROM customer_demographics WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Female'
SELECT list_name FROM email_lists WHERE list_description LIKE '%special offers%'
SELECT DISTINCT interest_category FROM customer_interests
SELECT customer_id, age, gender, location FROM customer_demographics;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_history, engagement_score FROM customer_behaviors;
SELECT customer_id, interest_category, interest_level FROM customer_interests;
SELECT list_id, list_name, list_description FROM email_lists;
SELECT rule_id, rule_name, rule_condition FROM segmentation_rules;
SELECT customer_id, age, gender, location, engagement_score FROM customer_demographics JOIN customer_behaviors ON customer_demographics.customer_id = customer_behaviors.customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, age, gender, location, interest_category, interest_level FROM customer_demographics JOIN customer_interests ON customer_demographics.customer_id = customer_interests.customer_id;

SELECT customer_id, purchase_history, engagement_score, interest_category, interest_level FROM customer_behaviors JOIN customer_interests ON customer_behaviors.customer_id = customer_interests.customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, age, gender, location, list_name, list_description FROM customer_demographics JOIN email_lists ON customer_demographics.customer_id = email_lists.list_id;
SELECT customer_id, age, gender, location, rule_name, rule_condition FROM customer_demographics JOIN segmentation_rules ON customer_demographics.customer_id = segmentation_rules.rule_id;

SELECT customer_id, age, gender, location, purchase_history, engagement_score, interest_category, interest_level FROM customer_demographics JOIN customer_behaviors ON customer_demographics.customer_id = customer_behaviors.customer_id JOIN customer_interests ON customer_behaviors.customer_id = customer_interests.customer_id;

SELECT customer_id, age, gender, location, purchase_history, engagement_score, list_name, list_description FROM customer_demographics JOIN customer_behaviors ON customer_demographics.customer_id = customer_behaviors.customer_id JOIN email_lists ON customer_behaviors.customer_id = email_lists.list_id;

SELECT customer_id, age, gender, location, interest_category, interest_level, rule_name, rule_condition FROM customer_demographics JOIN customer_interest ON customer_demographics.customer_id = customer_interests.customer_id JOIN segmentation_rules ON customer_interests.customer_id = segmentation_rules.rule_id;

SELECT customer_id, age, gender, location, purchase_history, engagement_score, interest_category, interest_level, list_name, list_description FROM customer_demographics JOIN customer_behaviors ON customer_demographics.customer_id = customer_behaviors.customer_id JOIN customer_interests ON customer_behaviors.customer_id = customer_interests.customer_id JOIN email_lists ON customer_interests.customer_id = email_lists.list_id;

SELECT customer_id, age, gender, location, purchase_history, engagement_score, interest_category, interest_level, list_name, list_description, rule_name, rule_condition FROM customer_demographics JOIN customer_behaviors ON customer_demographics.customer_id = customer_behaviors.customer_id JOIN customer_interests ON customer_behaviors.customer_id = customer_interests.customer_id JOIN email_lists ON customer_interests.customer_id = email_lists.list_id JOIN segmentation_rules ON customer_interests.customer_id = segmentation_rules.rule_id;
SELECT customer_id, age, gender, location FROM customer_demographics WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, age, gender, location FROM customer_demographics WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT customer_id, age, gender, location FROM customer_demographics WHERE location LIKE '%New York%';
SELECT customer_id, purchase_history, engagement_score FROM customer_behaviors WHERE engagement_score > 80;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_history, engagement_score FROM customer_behaviors WHERE purchase_history LIKE '%Product A%';
SELECT customer_id, interest_category, interest_level FROM customer_interests WHERE interest_level >= 3;
SELECT list_id, list_name, list_description FROM email_lists WHERE list_name = 'VIP Customers';
SELECT rule_id, rule_name, rule_condition FROM segmentation_rules WHERE rule_name LIKE '%High Value%';
